channel.title: Huge server, which plan?
channel.description:
I have a very *good i hope* question which i would like to ask.
I am hosting a server which i will be expecting to have around 200-300 members on average on it.
I was wondering what type of plan i should get for a VPS?
Like how much RAM i would need, and Bandwidth Allocation?
If anyone could answer it would help a ton!
Thanks.

item.title: Huge server, which plan?
item.dc:creator: @Apollo_man Apollo man
item.description:
@Apollo_man wrote:

I need a dedi :, and i am using wiped hyperion - sp on hyperion??

To last post, how much would 1 GB hold? I just need a rough estimate to go by, ( for hyperion source)

Read full topic

item.title: Huge server, which plan?
item.dc:creator: @Paradox-PvP Paradox-PvP
item.description:
@Paradox-PvP wrote:

200-300 Players huh…? Well, You dont have that many right now sooo I suggest starting off with something simple like a 1GB VPS, Then when Server becomes more populated then you simply Just Upgrade to Whatever you need.

Read full topic

item.title: Huge server, which plan?
item.dc:creator: @anthonyduka anthonyduka
item.description:
@anthonyduka wrote:

I just bought some shitty comp off ebay for 100$, and I wiped the harddrive and I host my comp on there.

Read full topic

item.title: Huge server, which plan?
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

It depends on which base you’re using. RuneSource can probably run that on a 512mb (really), while Project Insanity would need 1gb (prob. more).

Read full topic
